settings.name: Insert mean hour of nightroost beginning
settings.description: Insert, in 24-hour integer format, the hour beyond which subjects are assumed to be nightroosting.

settings.name: Insert mean hour of nightroost ending
settings.description: Insert, in 24-hour integer format, the hour before which subjects are assumed to be nightroosting.

settings.name: Upper speed bound for 'stationary' beahviour
settings.description: Insert the upper speed cutoff (in km/h) for behaviour to be classified as 'stationary'.

settings.name: Create summary plots
settings.description: Check this to generate, as artefacts, simple location plots of each bird's behaviourally-classified movements

settings.name: Use provided sunrise-sunset hours
settings.description: Check this to perform day-night classification using provided sunrise and sunset data. WARNING: You must have used the 'Add Local and Solar Time' MoveApp before this operation to create columns 'sunrise_timestamp' and 'sunset_timestamp'.

settings.name: Sunrise leeway (minutes):
settings.description: This is the number of minutes before/after sunrise that 'daytime' is considered to begin. (Negative numbers, e.g. -5 minutes, move this window before sunrise; positive numbers move it after.) NOTE: requires 'Use provided sunrise-sunset hours' to be TRUE.

settings.name: Sunset leeway (minutes):
settings.description: This is the number of minutes before/after sunset that 'night-time' is considered to begin. (Negative numbers, e.g. -5 minutes, move this window before sunset; positive numbers move it after.) NOTE: requires 'Use provided sunrise-sunset hours' to be TRUE.
